import React, {} from "react"; import Link from 'next/link' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Menu, Input, Button, Row, Col, Card, Avatar, Form } from "antd"; const dummy = { nickname: '제로초', Post: [], Followings: [], Followers: [], isLoggedIn: false, } const AppLayout = ({ children }) => { return (
노드버드 프로필 {dummy.isLoggedIn ? } actions={[
짹짹
{dummy.Post.length}
,
팔로잉
{dummy.Followings.length}
,
팔로워
{dummy.Followers.length}
]} > {dummy.nickname[0]}} title={dummy.nickname} description="This is the description" /> : (


)} 두번째 세번째 {children}
) } AppLayout.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node } export default AppLayout
